thread.title: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey confirmed as chief executive - Independent.ie
thread.title_full: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey confirmed as chief executive - Independent.ie - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Independent.ie
title: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey confirmed as chief executive - Independent.ie
text:
Twitter is embracing Jack Dorsey as its chief executive in the hopes that its once-spurned co-founder can hatch a plan to expand the short messaging service's audience and end nearly a decade of financial losses. It marks Mr Dorsey's second stint as chief executive since he helped start the San Francisco company more than nine years ago with Evan Williams, Biz Stone and Noah Glass.
 Independent.ie.
